channel.title: How can I create an object that is only visible for a player?
channel.description:
I'm trying to make the Farming skill. When the player rakes the patch, I want the weed to still appear to other players, but to the one who's raking, like in RuneScape. Is there a way to do it?
The base is AllStar (common 317).
